Chapter 1

Eyes closed , [Rachel Foster]52-rachel drew in a steeling breath , shut out the din of voices at the surrounding tables in [the bar]263-the bar , and said aloud for the first time ever , “ [Mom]452-adonis , [Dad]54-dad , [I]52-rachel resigned from [my]52-rachel position at the design firm after [Shaun]55-shaun took credit for [my]52-rachel work . [I]52-rachel moved out of [[our]1809-our shared apartment]1810-our shared apartment and took a job as [a bartender]1811-a bartender instead . ”[52-rachel]

Other than background chatter , silence greeted [her]52-rachel . [She]52-rachel held [her]52-rachel breath for a few seconds before opening [her]52-rachel eyes . The fifty - something guy across from [her]52-rachel blinked , fries gone cold on [his]264-his plate .

“ Should [I]52-rachel have started with [my]52-rachel ex taking credit for [my]52-rachel work , then moved to the resignation ? Or is it best to open with [the bartender]1811-a bartender bit ? ”[52-rachel] [she]52-rachel asked [him]264-his .

“ [I]56-oliver think [they]1812-they ’ll love [you]264-his no matter what . ”[56-oliver] The man on the guest side of [the bar]263-the bar , who ’d agreed to play the role of “ [Mom]452-adonis and [Dad]54-dad , ”[56-oliver] smiled .

[Oliver]56-oliver Something . [He]56-oliver had kind green eyes , a plain face , and thick hair dyed a shade too dark for [his]56-oliver age and skin tone . [He]56-oliver was a regular at [the bar where [she]52-rachel worked , enjoying the same exact meal ( [turkey club]266-turkey club]263-the bar , no mayo ) each and every week . [He]56-oliver always ate , but never drank alcohol , only soda . And [he]56-oliver had [a big , beautiful Great Dane]267-a big , beautiful great dane , a dog [she]52-rachel would soon be in charge of while living in [[his]56-oliver gorgeous apartment]268-his gorgeous apartment .

[She]52-rachel really needed to learn [Oliver]56-oliver ’s last name .

“ [You]1813-you say that because [you]1813-you ’ve never met [them]1813-you . ”[52-rachel] [She]52-rachel grabbed the soda gun from behind [the bar]263-the bar and refilled [his]56-oliver Diet Coke . “ Maybe [I]52-rachel should n’t tell [them]1813-you at all . ”[52-rachel]

“ [Rachel]52-rachel . ”[56-oliver] [He]56-oliver brushed [his]56-oliver hands on a paper napkin . “ [I]56-oliver ’m old enough to be [[your]56-oliver father]1814-uncle . ”[56-oliver]

“ [Uncle]1814-uncle , ”[52-rachel] [she]52-rachel corrected , being generous .

“ [Older uncle]1814-uncle . Either way , [I]56-oliver have longer perspective than [you]56-oliver do given that [I]56-oliver ’m closer to [the grave]1815-the grave , and [I]56-oliver ’m advising [you]56-oliver to tell [[your]56-oliver folks]1816-your folks what ’s going on . ”[56-oliver]

[He]56-oliver was right , of course . [She]52-rachel had n’t told [them]269-them anything , and the least [they]269-them deserved was the truth .

After [her]52-rachel and [Shaun]55-shaun ’s relationship had imploded , [she]52-rachel ’d grieved alone and put on a happy voice for [[her]52-rachel mother]270-her mother ’s phone calls . Inside , [she]52-rachel ’d been aching . Two years was a long time to be with [someone]271-someone . [She]52-rachel had begun to accept [his]271-someone faults — like the fact [he]271-someone was grouchy in the evenings and could be abrasive and critical — but when [he]271-someone ’d betrayed [her]52-rachel and took the promotion [she]52-rachel ’d earned , [she]52-rachel pushed the eject button without a second thought .

“ [I]52-rachel ’ll tell [them]272-her family . ”[52-rachel] Eventually . [She]52-rachel was n’t ready to call [[her]52-rachel family]272-her family in [Ohio]1-ohio and drop on [their]272-her family lap that [their]272-her family successful , [city - dwelling daughter]273-city - dwelling daughter was not watching the gold nameplate go up on [her]273-city - dwelling daughter corner office door . Instead , [she]273-city - dwelling daughter was stacking dirty dishes in a bus tub and cleaning sticky , disgusting residue out of the rubber mat over which [she]273-city - dwelling daughter poured libations for eight hours a night , five to six days a week .

Still better than being stabbed in the back by [the man who was supposed to love and protect [her]52-rachel]274-the man who was supposed to love and protect her .

[She]52-rachel took [Oliver]56-oliver ’s plate as [he]56-oliver reached for [his]56-oliver wallet . [He]56-oliver extracted a credit card , which [he]56-oliver used to pay for everything to earn miles for [his]56-oliver many business trips , and set a gold key next to it .

“ Front desk knows to expect [you]1817-you tomorrow . [Adonis]452-adonis has been asking about [you]1817-you since [you]1817-you stopped by last week , ”[56-oliver] [he]56-oliver said of [the Great Dane]275-the great dane with whom [he]56-oliver shared a life .

[She]273-city - dwelling daughter pocketed the key with a smile and settled the bill , swiping the card on the machine a few feet down [the bar]263-the bar .

“ The front desk was incredibly thorough and scares [me]277-they a little . ”[277-they] Last week when [she]273-city - dwelling daughter was there , [they]277-they required two forms of ID and took a photo of [her]273-city - dwelling daughter to put in [their]277-they database . “ [I]273-city - dwelling daughter ’m surprised [they]277-they did n’t ask for fingerprints . ”[273-city - dwelling daughter] [She]273-city - dwelling daughter tore off the receipts and handed [them]277-they over with a pen . “ [Adonis]452-adonis is gorgeous , but let ’s both admit [he]452-adonis only loves [me]273-city - dwelling daughter because of the liver treats [I]273-city - dwelling daughter fed [him]452-adonis . ”[273-city - dwelling daughter]

[Oliver]56-oliver laughed as [he]56-oliver signed the receipt . “ [His]452-adonis loyalty is easily bought . Like [[his]452-adonis owner]1818-his owner ’s . ”[56-oliver]

“ Truer words . ”[273-city - dwelling daughter] [She]273-city - dwelling daughter accepted the pen and the receipt , glancing at the tip line to see that [Oliver]56-oliver had once again tipped the amount of [his]56-oliver meal , which [she]273-city - dwelling daughter used to yell at [him]56-oliver for but now accepted that [he]56-oliver was n’t going to listen to [her]273-city - dwelling daughter no matter what .

“ Thank [you]56-oliver for doing this , [Rachel]52-rachel , ”[56-oliver] [he]56-oliver said . “ [I]56-oliver did n’t expect to be in [Japan]2-japan for an entire month . ”[56-oliver]

“ [You]52-rachel ’re welcome . ”[273-city - dwelling daughter] [She]273-city - dwelling daughter ’d confided in [Oliver]56-oliver one late night how [her]273-city - dwelling daughter roommate situation was n’t working , and [she]273-city - dwelling daughter needed to find a new place to live , never imagining [he]56-oliver ’d offer to solve [her]273-city - dwelling daughter problem . As it turned out , [he]56-oliver was due to go away on business and [his]56-oliver dog sitter had double - booked [herself]273-city - dwelling daughter . [He]56-oliver ’d asked [Rachel]52-rachel if [she]52-rachel ’d take the gig , sharing that [he]56-oliver could n’t stomach the idea of [Adonis]452-adonis in a kennel . When [he]56-oliver told [her]52-rachel [his]56-oliver address , [Rachel]52-rachel had nearly drooled on the bar top between [them]278-them .

[Crane Tower]373-crane tower . Oh la la .

Not only would [she]52-rachel live in [[his]56-oliver glorious fifteen - hundred - square - foot apartment]279-his glorious fifteen - hundred - square - foot apartment , but [he]56-oliver was also paying [her]52-rachel . Generously . [She]52-rachel could add the money to [her]52-rachel savings and put a deposit down on [her]52-rachel own place . It was either that or move back [home]280-home , but [she]52-rachel was n’t willing to concede the battle yet . [Chicago]540-chicago may be kicking [her]52-rachel around , but [she]52-rachel was tougher than [she]52-rachel looked .

[She]52-rachel hoped .

Once [she]52-rachel found a better gig than bartending , a professional and brag - worthy profession devoid of rat - bastard , [promotion - stealing boyfriends]281-promotion - stealing boyfriends , [she]52-rachel ’d be good to go . Not because bragging about [her]52-rachel job was important for [her]52-rachel , but it was for [[her]52-rachel parents]282-her parents . [They]282-her parents were [the ones who were so proud of [[their]282-her parents daughter]283-their daughter , [the “ city girl]283-their daughter]282-her parents . ”[282-her parents]

[Oliver]56-oliver bid [her]283-their daughter adieu and left as [[Rachel]52-rachel ’s roommate]284-rachel ’s roommate - slash - coworker , [Breanna]58-breanna , stepped through the door [he]58-breanna held open for [her]284-rachel ’s roommate .

At [the bar]263-the bar , [Bree]59-bree slid [her]59-bree coat from [her]59-bree arms and stashed it beneath the register . “ [Soooo]60-soooo . How ’s [Daddy Warbucks]61-daddy warbucks ? ”[59-bree]

“ [Bree]59-bree . ”[52-rachel] [Rachel]52-rachel laughed as [she]52-rachel washed a beer glass in the double sink . That roommate situation that was n’t working ? It had nothing to do with [Bree]59-bree or [her]59-bree significant other , [Dean]62-dean . [Rachel]52-rachel adored [Bree]59-bree , and vice versa . [They]286-they ’d become close in the two months since [Rachel]52-rachel moved in with [her]52-rachel , when both [Bree]59-bree and [Rachel]52-rachel swore [they]286-they ’d be [roommates]287-roommates for years . Then [Dean]62-dean proposed , [Bree]59-bree said yes , and [he]62-dean moved in and well … [Rachel]52-rachel was now a third wheel .

[She]52-rachel did n’t want to be in the way of what [[her]52-rachel friends]288-her friends had , which was special . [She]52-rachel could tell because [she]52-rachel knew what a relationship looked like when it was n’t right . It was strain and silence and frustration and animosity brewing under a surface that [no one]289-no one disturbed .

“ [I]59-bree ’m going to miss [you]59-bree when [you]59-bree go live in luxury for a month . ”[59-bree] [Bree]59-bree pouted , pushing [her]59-bree full lips out . [Her]59-bree chin - length brown hair was smooth tonight , [her]59-bree eyes sparkling thanks to glittery eye shadow .

“ No , [you]59-bree wo n’t . [You]59-bree and [Dean]62-dean will probably run around naked the moment [I]59-bree leave . ”[59-bree]

[Bree]59-bree grinned .

[Rachel]52-rachel was happy for [[her]52-rachel friend]290-her friend . [She]52-rachel ’d met [Bree]59-bree at [Dusty]63-dusty ’s , [a bar that was a downscale Andromeda]291-a bar that was a downscale andromeda . [Bree]59-bree had been working through the last week of a two - week notice .

[They]292-they ’d bonded almost instantly , which [Rachel]52-rachel did with almost no one . By the time [she]52-rachel ’d made the decision to leave [her]52-rachel marketing job , [Rachel]52-rachel called [Bree]59-bree to ask if [the Andromeda Club]293-the andromeda club was hiring .

It ’d occurred to [her]52-rachel that when [she]52-rachel ’d moved to [Chicago]540-chicago alone , [she]52-rachel intended to be [an island]294-an island . [She]52-rachel ’d never expected to have [a roommate]295-a roommate — certainly not one [she]52-rachel was dating — and since the whole [Shaun debacle]55-shaun , [she]52-rachel ’d become anxious to reclaim [her]52-rachel island status . [She]52-rachel ’d hate to think [she]52-rachel ’d lost the ability to be independent after coming to depend on [a man who was n’t dependable in the end]296-a man who was n’t dependable in the end .

[Her]52-rachel recent breakup with [[her]52-rachel boyfriend of two years]297-her boyfriend of two years , being homeless , and losing the job for which [she]52-rachel ’d attained [her]52-rachel degree was a series of minor setbacks .

Living with a dog was the bridging step from [roommate]298-roommate to once again living on [her]52-rachel own , and [she]52-rachel would take it . Somewhere in [her]52-rachel lived [a fearless woman who was ready to take on a new adventure]299-a fearless woman who was ready to take on a new adventure .

[Rachel]52-rachel was determined to find [her]52-rachel .

* * *

[[Tag]416-tag ’s oldest brother]300-tag ’s oldest brother and [CEO]65-ceo for [Crane Hotels]5-crane hotels , [Reese Crane]115-reese , had no love for the board of directors around the conference table . As of last year , when [they]301-they ’d razzed [Tag]416-tag about lagging profits at [the hotel]302-the hotel and pool bars nationwide , [he]416-tag had recently put [them]301-they on [his]416-tag shit list as well .

Today , [they]301-they ’d changed [their]301-they tune .

“ Given that the losses fall within an acceptable range , [we]1819-our are downgrading the bar issues at Guest and Restaurant Services from a code red to a code yellow . ”[67-frank] [Frank]67-frank smiled at [his]67-frank own joke , but the only thought in [Tag]416-tag ’s brain was that [the older man]303-the older man ’s teeth matched [his]303-the older man code . “ Thank [you]67-frank for [your]67-frank careful preparation , [Tag]416-tag . Now if [you]67-frank ’ll excuse [us]1819-our , [Bob]64-bobbie , [Lilith]69-lilith , and [I]416-tag have a meeting to attend [downtown]1820-downtown . This marks the end of [our]1819-our agenda . Unless either of [you]67-frank have anything to add ? ”[416-tag]

[Tag]416-tag had plenty to add , but when [he]416-tag opened [his]416-tag mouth , [Reese]115-reese spoke for [him]416-tag .

“ Nothing on [our]1819-our end . ”[416-tag]

[Tag]416-tag felt a muscle in [his]416-tag cheek twitch . [Reese]115-reese cast [him]416-tag a sideways glance as [the board]304-the board shuffled into [the hall]305-the hall . The door shut behind [them]306-them and [he]416-tag faced [[his]416-tag brother]307-his brother .

“ The term ‘ acceptable losses ’ is n’t bad news . ”[115-reese] [Reese]115-reese arched an eyebrow .

“ Loss should never be ‘ acceptable , ’ ”[416-tag] [Tag]416-tag growled . “ The board harps on falling profits in the hotel bars last year , but as of thirty seconds ago [they]306-them no longer care ? ”[416-tag]

[Tag]416-tag dropped [his]416-tag unused number 2 pencil to push a hand through [his]416-tag hair , then remembered it was pulled back . Long , nearly to [his]416-tag elbows , [he]416-tag preferred wearing [his]416-tag hair down , but for board meetings [he]416-tag wrangled it into a low - hanging ponytail / man bun hybrid . [He]416-tag ’d also wedged [his]416-tag wide shoulders into an uncomfortable button - down and wrapped [his]416-tag bulky thighs in restrictive trousers . [He]416-tag felt … not like [himself]416-tag . Agitated about being here , about this whole downgrading thing .

Ever [the underestimated brother]307-his brother , [he]416-tag should n’t be surprised that [they]308-they ’d shrugged [him]416-tag off . Even if [Guest]70-guest and [Restaurant Services]6-restaurant services was n’t [[his]416-tag baby]309-his baby — and it was — [he’d]416-tag consider cooperating worth it if [the board]304-the board left [him]416-tag the hell alone and went back to whatever it was [they]308-they did when [they]308-they were n’t giving [the Crane brothers]311-the crane brothers grief .

“ [I]416-tag prefer to handle this , not ignore it , ”[416-tag] [Tag]416-tag said .

Chapter 2

A sharp bark startled [Tag]416-tag , and [his]416-tag arm jerked , dragging the tip of the Sharpie across [the Post]353-the post - it and onto the photograph [he]416-tag had been trying not to ruin . Woof ! Woof ! Woo - oof !

[He]416-tag could not freaking work in these conditions .

[Tag]416-tag had been patient — [Adonis]452-adonis was a dog , and dogs barked — but the dog had never barked this much , and never this late at night . [He]452-adonis ’d been determined to ignore it , but [he]452-adonis needed every ounce of concentration [he]452-adonis could muster .

[He]452-adonis was reviewing the setup for [the main candidate]358-the main candidate for a recent bar redesign : the pool bar at [the Crane Makai]82-the crane makai in [Hawaii]397-hawaii . [Woof]83-woof !

“ All right , that ’s it . ”[416-tag] [Tag]416-tag shoved the stack of photos aside and moved through [[his]416-tag penthouse]337-his penthouse , out the door , and punched a button in [the elevator]329-the elevator . Woo - woo - woof !

“ [Adonis]452-adonis , hey , [boy]1826-boy . ”[416-tag]

“ Are [you]452-adonis a good dog ? ”[84-barking] A small whine was followed by a more desperate bark .

“ There [you]452-adonis go . [[Rachel]52-rachel ’s mother]270-her mother was standing in [the Andromeda Club]293-the andromeda club knocking on a table . An annoying rap - rap - rap . [He]56-oliver was like a sexy city lumberjack .

“ Hi . ”[56-oliver]

Chapter 19

[His]416-tag heart .

Chapter 25

When [Tag]416-tag arrived at [[his]416-tag penthouse]337-his penthouse , [he]416-tag was ready to drop . The overnight flight had been rough , and thanks to [the cabin]1037-the cabin shaking like a Mexican jumping bean , [he]416-tag had n’t slept a wink .

Despite the motion sickness , [he]416-tag ’d stayed awake and worked . Thanks to a long night of sleep deprivation , [his]416-tag brain was fuzzy and [his]416-tag head was throbbing , and all [he]416-tag wanted to do was fall into bed and sleep for days . [He]416-tag had to grab at least a few hours , or [he]416-tag ’d be jet - lagged forever .

Despite the rough flight [home]359-merina and the hectic schedule while [he]416-tag was [there]359-merina , [he]416-tag was glad [he]416-tag made the trip . There had been a narrow window to buy fast and close quickly , and [another party]1720-another party had been interested in [the land]2461-the land . [He]416-tag and [Reese]115-reese had arranged to have [[their]1722-their lawyer]1723-their lawyer fly over to facilitate the agreement . And like that , [the Crane Maui hotel]1724-the crane maui hotel had a foundation . Now it was done and [Tag]416-tag had never been so grateful to be at [[his]416-tag own penthouse]1725-his own penthouse .

There was an added benefit to [his]416-tag trip : the relentless feeling of plummeting headfirst into [Terror Town]51-terror town had dissipated . Whatever [he]416-tag ’d been upset about while sharing [his]416-tag place with [Rachel]52-rachel — whatever bizarre fear had rattled [him]416-tag — was gone . [He]416-tag ’d missed [Rachel]52-rachel so much , [he]416-tag could hardly stand it .
